Package com.hush.pgp.io.packets

Class Summary
CompressedDataInputStream A stream to read PGP compressed data.
CompressedDataOutputStream A stream to write out PGP compressed data.
LiteralDataInputStream A stream to read PGP literal data.
LiteralDataOutputStream A stream to write out PGP literal data.
OnePassSignatureInputStream A stream to read in PGP one pass signature info.
OnePassSignatureOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP one-pass signature.
PacketContentInputStream A stream to read the content of a PGP packet.
PacketContentOutputStream A stream to write the content of a PGP packet.
PacketInputStream A stream to read a PGP packet.
PacketOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP packet.
PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream A stream to read in a PGP public key encrypted session key.
PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP symmetric key encrypted session key.
PublicKeyInputStream A stream to read in a PGP public key.
PublicKeyOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP public key.
PublicSubkeyInputStream A stream to read in a PGP public subkey.
PublicSubkeyOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP public subkey.
SecretKeyInputStream A stream to read in a PGP secret key
The getters should be used to retrieve all information from this stream.
SecretKeyOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP secret key.
SecretSubkeyInputStream A stream to read in a PGP secret subkey.
SecretSubkeyOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP secret subkey.
SignatureInputStream A stream to read in a PGP signature.
SignatureOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP signature.
SymmetricallyEncryptedDataInputStream A stream to read in PGP symmetrically encrypted data.
SymmetricallyEncryptedDataOutputStream A stream to write out PGP symmetrically encrypted data.
SymmetricallyEncryptedIntegrityProtectedDataInputStream A stream to read in PGP symmetrically encrypted data.
SymmetricallyEncryptedIntegrityProtectedDataOutputStream A stream to write out PGP symmetrically encrypted integrity protected data.
SymmetricKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream A stream to read in a PGP symmetric key encrypted session key.
SymmetricKeyEncryptedSessionKeyOutputStream  
TrustInputStream A stream to read in PGP trust information.
TrustOutputStream A stream to write out PGP trust information.
UserAttributeInputStream A stream to read in a PGP user attribute.
UserIDInputStream A stream to read in a PGP user ID.
UserIDOutputStream A stream to write out a PGP user ID.
